channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New Jersey Pinelands forest fire is mostly contained, official says
item.description: Crews have mostly contained a forest fire in the southern New Jersey Pinelands. The New Jersey Forest Fire Service reports that the blaze in Berkeley Township was 80% contained as of midday Wednesday.

item.title: A Philadelphia officer has died of his injuries from a June shooting
item.description: A Philadelphia police officer has died from his wounds nearly three months after being shot in the neck after a traffic stop.

item.title: The Oklahoma Supreme Court denies a request to reconsider Tulsa Race Massacre lawsuit dismissal
item.description: The Oklahoma Supreme Court has rejected a request to reconsider its ruling to dismiss a lawsuit filed by the two known living survivors of the 1921 Tulsa Race Massacre.
